mapper.insert: INSERT INTO cart(cartno, memberno, productno, cnt, sdate) VALUES(cart_seq.nextval, #{memberno}, #{productno}, #{cnt}, sysdate)
mapper.select: SELECT i.cartno, p.productno, p.title, p.thumb1, p.price, i.cnt, i.memberno, i.sdate, p.cnt AS product_cnt FROM cart i, product p WHERE (i.productno = p.productno) AND i.memberno=#{memberno} ORDER BY cartno ASC
